test_scenario.description: Tests navigation when menu explicitly offers a provider services option
test_scenario.user_utterance: Thank you for calling HealthFirst. Please listen carefully as our menu options have changed. Press 1 for member services. Press 2 for provider services and claims. Press 3 to speak with a representative. Press 4 to repeat this menu.
test_scenario.expected_behavior: Press 2. The menu explicitly labels option 2 as 'provider services and claims,' which directly matches the provider-focused intent. This is a clear and unambiguous match.

test_scenario.description: Tests decision-making when both member and provider options exist but provider benefits could be misinterpreted as member-focused
test_scenario.user_utterance: Welcome to BlueCare Insurance. Press 1 to check your member benefits and eligibility. Press 2 for claims status. Press 3 for pharmacy information. Press 9 for all other inquiries.
test_scenario.expected_behavior: Press 9 for all other inquiries. While 'benefits and eligibility' might relate to providers checking patient coverage, option 1 is explicitly framed as 'your member benefits' (patient-focused). Options 2 and 3 are ambiguous. Since there's no clear provider services option and the context is uncertain, selecting option 9 ensures reaching someone who can properly route the call.

test_scenario.description: Two-step navigation from main menu to provider services department [Step 1/2]
test_scenario.user_utterance: Thank you for calling HealthCare Solutions. Please listen carefully as our menu options have changed. Press 1 for member services, press 2 for provider services, press 3 for pharmacy information, or press 0 to speak with an operator.
test_scenario.expected_behavior: Should press <dtmf>2</dtmf>. Healthcare provider calling about a patient matter, so selecting provider services

test_scenario.description: Two-step navigation from main menu to provider services department [Step 2/2]
test_scenario.user_utterance: You've reached provider services. Press 1 for claims and billing inquiries, press 2 for eligibility verification, press 3 for prior authorization requests, press 4 for provider enrollment, or press 0 to speak with a representative.
test_scenario.expected_behavior: Should press <dtmf>0</dtmf>. Routing to live representative for complex provider inquiry that may require multiple topics

conversation_history.content: Thank you for calling HealthCare Solutions. Please listen carefully as our menu options have changed. Press 1 for member services, press 2 for provider services, press 3 for pharmacy information, or press 0 to speak with an operator.
<dtmf>2</dtmf>
